text: Great customer service! Alonzo was extremely helpful in getting our gold fortified certificate quickly. Highly recommended this company.

name: Patrick Vowell
text: Within one hour of posting problem Mr. LaCosta took care of issues immediately.  Thanks

resp.text: Patrick,  This is Vince LaCoste, the owner of Bethel Engineering.  I am sorry that you had this experience and I am getting to the bottom of this quickly.  I will be calling you soon.

name: Brian Lancaster
text: Vince and his staff were great to work with! They were very professional and extremely responsive to all my requests and questions! I would highly recommend Bethel Engineering!

name: Ronnie Toomey
text: Great staff to work with.  Fast and efficient.

text: Gets it done.! Wonderful to work with.

text: They surveyed my property, their crew was very friendly and professional, and completed the job quickly.

name: D Nunn (Big O)
text: Very UNresponsive, I contacted this establishment to get a survey done on my property...after several emails and phone calls...haven been promised a price quote some 5 weeks ago, I have yet to get a call from the representative (I will withhold her name).

name: Marie Boyer
text: Great people work in this office! 😁

text: Great group

name: ConstructNoden
text: Great company to work with.

name: Rolando Rodriguez
text: Nice service

name: Ben Landers
text: I would highly recommend not using Pugh Wright McNally for a new construction survey. The initial survey cost was triple the price of any of their competitors. They charged an additional $350 for a plot plan and to stake the house out. None of the additional costs were disclosed up front. We were under the impression that the initial $950 would cover all aspects related to pre construction survey. We were told today that it costs $1300.

resp.text:
BL. Sorry you are unhappy with the cost to do this work.  Our records indicate you were quoted an estimate of $900 for a boundary survey and proposed plot plan. An additional $200 for a Certificate to subdivide.  Fees are paid by property owners for recording.  No quote was provided to stake the house.  These are three separate items and significantly more than just a “pre-construction survey” The work was way more involved than expected and as you are aware we discounted the invoice over $670 not charge more than the quoted amount plus recording fees.

Getting the work done properly and accurately is more important than recovering our expenses. PWM never strives to be the least expensive and we never tell a client that we are.  What we do is provide a quality product that we will stand behind at a fair market value.

Blake McAnally

name: Barry Johnson
text: Great at their job

resp.text: Thanks Barry!  Happy to have had the opportunity to work with you.

name: Gene Martin
text: I have used Northstar on more than one occasion . Very professional and thorough. My family used them when our lake cottage suffered  damage during Hurricane Michael and their report on the lack of true structural damage allowed us to rebuild instead of bulldozing it down. I use them for all my engineering needs as a real estate agent and highly recommend them.

name: Steve Lowe
text:
Crooked!! They keep poor records, bully their customers and don't provide a good service. I Highly advise choosing another engineering company.
Price gouging is a crime, especially during a natural disaster.

text: Very helpful and the staff is really nice.

text: Very detailed plans.

name: Bob Bartlett
text: I inspected the facility on a weekend.  You can tell a lot about a company by the way they keep their facility.   It was very neat.  Their equipment was clean and well maintained.  The location was easy to find.

name: K. L.
text: VERY NICE PEOPLE AND  BUSINESS ESTABLISHMENT 👍👍👍

name: Joey Syron
text:
We at John G Walton have worked and completed numerous projects throughout Mobile County with Driven Engineering overseeing the design, implementation and installation. We as a company currently have projects on the books with Avalisha and Driven and look forward to getting them started and complete. Driven does some of the best plans in the county, they have engineering technology in building models that is years away from other companies.

If your in need of a design firm, this is definitely the company your searching for.

name: Bama Junky
text: Driven has provided excellent service for my department over the past 4 years.  The staff is very knowledgeable and professional.

name: Rx Burner
text: We have worked with this firm for about 6 years (design work, surveys, & dam inspections) and have been very pleased with their work. They are very responsive and great to get along with.

name: Allen Rentz
text: Avilisha and her firm has been professional from day one.  They are reliable and very knowledgeable.  Great family feel and friendly staff.

name: Randy Spear
text: Utilized Avalisha Fisher's expertise in litigation as an expert witness. Her vast experience and knowledge of both applicable building codes and sound engineering practices yielded tremendous results. Highly recommend Driven Engineering.
